mapper.select: SELECT cs.TYPE_OF_CANCER_ID AS typeOfCancer, cs.CANCER_STUDY_IDENTIFIER AS cancerStudyIdentifier, cs.NAME AS name, cs.DESCRIPTION AS description, cs.CITATION AS citation, cs.PMID AS pmid, cs.`GROUPS` AS `groups`, rg.NAME AS referenceGenome FROM cancer_study cs JOIN reference_genome rg ON rg.REFERENCE_GENOME_ID = cs.REFERENCE_GENOME_ID WHERE cs.CANCER_STUDY_IDENTIFIER = #{studyId}
